law.catch_line: A hospital may discharge a patient:...

text.section: A hospital's process for transfer or discharge shall be based on a patient's assessed needs.
If a hospital fails to comply with the requirements of this section, the Secretary may impose a civil money penalty not to exceed $10,000 for each failure to comply.
A hospital may appeal a civil money penalty imposed under subsection (c) of this section in accordance with Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article.
